ResearchDataEntry.Name: Freight Carts
ResearchDataEntry.PreDescription: We'll need a way to get resources to the machines that need them. With a simplistic AI it would be possible to construct a simple cart system to move goods to where they are needed.
ResearchDataEntry.PostDescription: At the moment we only have scrap material and soft metals to work with so we can't move very much at a time nor very quickly but at least we won't need to do the heavy lifting by hand.
